As of October 1st, I will be a **PhD candidate at the Interdisciplinary Transformation University Austria** ([IT:U](https://it-u.at/en/)) in Linz. There I am part of the [Inverse Complexity Group](https://skewed.de/lab/), working on Complex Systems and Network Science, led by Tiago Peixoto. You can find my work profile [here](https://it-u.at/en/research/team/sebastian-kusch/).
